form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to specify which smaller institutions may qualify for an 18-month examination cycle.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Bank Exam Cycle Reform Act of 2015.

section.header: Smaller institutions qualifying for 18-month examination cycle
section.text: Section 10(d) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act (12 U.S.C. 1820(d)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking $500,000,000 and inserting $1,000,000,000; and
in subparagraph (C)(ii), by striking $100,000,000 and inserting $200,000,000; and

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 6, 2015.
